replies.bodyText: I didn't know there's a difference between the two? I believe they both just write to the port-specific ErrorLog file.
replies.author: rjrudin

replies.bodyText: @srinathgit - Its being used in few other places as well in the same file. If xdmp.log makes more sense and is more helpful then should we replace those as well ?
replies.author: xnikhil08

replies.bodyText: console.log should be ok , there doesn't seem to be a difference
